outline:
1. deed, work
    1. deed, thing done, act
    2. work, labour
    3. business, pursuit
    4. undertaking, enterprise
    5. achievement
    6. deeds, works (of deliverance and judgment)
    7. work, thing made
    8. work (of God)
    9. product
kjv_def: act, art, [phrase] bakemeat, business, deed, do(-ing), labor, thing made, ware of making, occupation, thing offered, operation, possession, [idiom] well, (handy-, needle-, net-) work(ing, -manship), wrought.
strongs_def: an action (good or bad); generally, a transaction; abstractly, activity; by implication, a product (specifically, a poem) or (generally) property
